definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

pinyin: bu4 ke3 che4 xiao1 xin4 yong4 zheng4

definition: instrument of credit/letter of credit/see also 信用證|信用证[xin4 yong4 zheng4]/CL:張|张[zhang1]

sentences.english: Can you please open an irrevocable documentary credit?
sentences.chinese: 能开一张不可撤消的跟单信用证吗？

sentences.english: Most global transactions are carried out by a letter of credit (LC).
sentences.chinese: 大多数全球交易都是通过信用证白勺方式完成。

sentences.english: L/C Payment problem is becoming serious to each bank.
sentences.chinese: 信用证垫款问题是各银行面对的日趋严重的一个问题。

sentences.english: Payment will be made by irrevocable Letter of Credit against presentation of documents to the issuing bank.
sentences.chinese: 付款方式为凭单据以不可撤消的信用证向发卡行议付。

sentences.english: In compliance with your request, we have instructed the bank to open the L/C in a few days.
sentences.chinese: 应你方的要求，我们已通知银行在几日内开立信用证。

sentences.english: We are in receipt of your L/C covering 1000 pairs of leather shoes.
sentences.chinese: 我们已收到你方关于1000双皮鞋的信用证。

sentences.english: An additional HKD100. - monthly fee will be charged if Diners Club is to be accepted.
sentences.chinese: 如选择接受大来信用证，将额外收取月费港币壹佰圆。

sentences.english: We will instruct our banker to amend the credit telegraphically.
sentences.chinese: 我们将通知银行用电修改信用证。

sentences.english: We shall open a letter of credit in your favour to be settled in US dollars.
sentences.chinese: 我们将开立以你方为收益人的信用证，以美元结算。

sentences.english: We will handle these payments as soon as we receive the L/ Cs .
sentences.chinese: 一旦信用证寄过来，我们将会妥善处理好这些付款。

sentences.english: B: Second, about terms of payment by L/C.
sentences.chinese: 第二，我们同意用信用证付款。

sentences.english: We sll the time require L/C for our exports.
sentences.chinese: 咱们出口一向条件以信用证付款。

sentences.english: I enclose herewith copy of the Letter of Credit.
sentences.chinese: 随函我扶上信用证的副本。

sentences.english: This credit is available with The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation, Shanghai by negotiation against beneficiary’s drafts drawn under this L/C at sight basis.
sentences.chinese: 本信用证在上海汇丰银行议付，随附受益人即期汇票。
不可撤销的非转让信用证。

sentences.english: The L/C must reach us 30 days before shipment.
sentences.chinese: 信用证必须在装船前30天开到我处。

pinyin: bu4 ke3 che4 xiao1 xin4 yong4 zheng4

definition: to defer payment/to pay back over long term
to accept (i.e. acknowledge as calling for payment) (commerce)/to honor (a check, a promise)
(international trade) documentation (e.g. a bill of lading)
to present (a bill of exchange etc) for payment
